dn29:2.4: Vadhoyeva kho → vadhoyeveko (mr) | vattati → anuvattati (sya-all, mr)
dn29:2.5: tepi → te tesu (mr) | nibbinnarūpā → nibiṇṇarūpā (pts-vp-pli1ed); nibbindarūpā (mr)
dn29:9.5: satthā ca te → satthā ca te arahaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn29:21.12: paripūraṃ → parisuddhataraṃ (bj, sya-all, mr); paripūrataraṃ (?) | hetaṃ passati → na passatīti (sya-all, mr)
dn29:54.2: tathā → tattha (bj, sya-all, mr) | byākātabbā, kiṃ vo ahaṃ te → kiṃ te ahante aññatitthiye (sya1ed, sya2ed); kiṃ no ahaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn29:56.28: tathā → tattha (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | byākarissāmi → byākarissāmīti (bj, csp1ed); vyākarissāmi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn29:57.2: byākātabbā, kiṃ vo ahaṃ te tathā → kiṃ vo ahaṃ te tattha (bj); kiṃ te ahaṃ te tattha (sya1ed, sya2ed)
